headline.main: EU Ministers Irked Over Erdogan Comments on Germany but Urge Restraint
headline.print_headline: EU Ministers Irked Over Erdogan Comments on Germany but Urge Restraint

lead_paragraph: European Union foreign ministers on Monday urged restraint towards Turkey as some said they opposed campaigning by foreign politicians on their soil, stepping into a row that has soured relations between Ankara and Berlin.
snippet: European Union foreign ministers on Monday urged restraint towards Turkey as some said they opposed campaigning by foreign politicians on their soil, stepping into a row that has soured relations between Ankara and Berlin....
